name: Karttapalvelu
description: Leaflet is the leading open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps. Weighing just about 39 KB of JS, it has all the mapping features most developers ever need. Leaflet is designed with simplicity, performance and usability in mind. It works efficiently across all major desktop and mobile platforms, can be extended with lots of plugins, has a beautiful, easy to use and well-documented API and a simple, readable source code that is a joy to contribute to.

name: Luontoreitit
description: Citynature.eu tarjoaa avoimen REST API -rajapinnan CC BY 4.0 -lisenssillä, jonka kautta applikaatiokehittäjä voi käyttää sivuilla olevaa tietoa sekä Helsingistä että Tallinnasta.

name: Tekijätiedot
description: Web-tekniikat ja digitaalinen media toteutus TX00DJ99-3021. Ryhmä B.
